localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Perch allows you to use your existing recurring expenses such as rent, Hulu and Spotify as credit worthy data to boost your credit score. ⠀ Now available on the iOS App Store!
blogPost.body: Perch allows you to use your existing recurring expenses such as rent, Hulu and Spotify as credit worthy data to boost your credit score. ⠀ Now available on the iOS App Store!
blogPost.title: Perch Credit - Use recurring expenses to boost your credit score
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Perch允许您使用现有的经常性支出，如租金、Hulu和Spotify作为信用价值数据，以提高您的信用评分。⠀现在可以在iOS App Store上使用!
localize.tagline: 利用经常性支出来提高你的信用分数

localize.description: Perch允許您使用現有的經常性支出，如租金、Hulu和Spotify作爲信用價值數據，以提高您的信用評分。⠀現在可以在iOS App Store上使用!
localize.tagline: 利用經常性支出來提高你的信用分數

previous.excerpt: Current tools make it hard to hear your thoughts. Totallib’s note-taking experience powered by GPT-3 lets you write to think. Compound your knowledge through linked notes — from the small seed to the big picture. Spark new ideas with AI-augmented writing.
previous.title: Totallib - Note-taking for better thinking, augmented by AI.

localize.description: 目前的工具很难听到你的想法。Totallib的笔记体验由GPT-3驱动，让你边写边想。通过链接的笔记来复合你的知识--从小种子到大图片。通过AI辅助写作激发新的想法。
localize.tagline: 记笔记是为了更好的思考，在AI的加持下。

localize.description: 目前的工具很難聽到你的想法。Totallib的筆記體驗由GPT-3驅動，讓你邊寫邊想。通過鏈接的筆記來複合你的知識--從小種子到大圖片。通過AI輔助寫作激發新的想法。
localize.tagline: 記筆記是爲了更好的思考，在AI的加持下。

next.excerpt: Buffer’s https://buffer.com/engage helps small businesses stay on top of their Instagram comments and build a loyal and engaged audience. It automatically detects important interactions that need attention, and makes it quick and easy to reply or dismiss comments.
next.title: Engagement by Buffer - A faster way to engage with your Instagram audience.

localize.description: Buffer的https://buffer.com/engage，帮助小企业保持对Instagram评论的关注，并建立忠诚和参与的受众。它能自动检测出需要关注的重要互动，并使回复或驳回评论变得快速而简单。
localize.tagline: 与你的Instagram受众互动的更快方式。

localize.description: Buffer的https://buffer.com/engage，幫助小企業保持對Instagram評論的關注，並建立忠誠和參與的受衆。它能自動檢測出需要關注的重要互動，並使回覆或駁回評論變得快速而簡單。
localize.tagline: 與你的Instagram受衆互動的更快方式。
